Based on the user's preference cues, I would recommend The Amazing Spider-Man (2012) to them.
The movie stars Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone as Peter Parker and Gwen Stacy respectively.
The plot revolves around a young man who gains spider-like abilities after being bitten by a genetically modified spider.
Peter Parker uses his newfound powers to fight crime in New York City.
Throughout the movie, viewers witness Peter Parker's struggles to control his powers while also dealing with the challenges of being a hero and facing everyday challenges.
Overall, The Amazing Spider-Man (2012) is an entertaining and engaging superhero movie that will appeal to fans of the genre.
